top_evidence.label: support
top_evidence.snippet_text: The company achieved carbon neutrality across all its global operations in FY2022.

top_evidence.label: insufficient
top_evidence.snippet_text: NGO watchdog GreenWatch accused GreenwashCo of overstating its carbon neutrality claims.

top_evidence.label: insufficient
top_evidence.snippet_text: GreenwashCo claims all its operations are powered by renewable energy, though the company has not published independent verification reports.

top_evidence.label: insufficient
top_evidence.snippet_text: The company achieved a 25% reduction in scope 1 emissions compared to the FY2020 baseline through solar expansion and process optimization.

top_evidence.label: insufficient
top_evidence.snippet_text: The Honest Company achieved a 90% reduction in single-use plastic packaging across its product lines, verified by third-party auditors.

top_evidence.label: insufficient
top_evidence.snippet_text: Infosys outlines a bolder ESG Vision 2030; aspires to become climate positive by 2030 and expands global skilling and livelihood commitments.

top_evidence.label: insufficient
top_evidence.snippet_text: Coal India announced plans to invest ₹20,000 crore in clean coal technologies and carbon capture initiatives by 2030.

top_evidence.label: insufficient
top_evidence.snippet_text: The company will invest ₹75,000 crore over the next decade in renewable infrastructure and smart grids.

top_evidence.label: insufficient
top_evidence.snippet_text: The company’s environmental disclosure page lacks scope 3 emissions data, raising transparency concerns.

top_evidence.label: insufficient
top_evidence.snippet_text: The company reduced particulate matter emissions by 15% through advanced dust suppression systems.
